span.strong: The Hazelwood School District is Fully Accredited by the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education.
Did you miss an autodial call from HSD? Dial 855-671-1878 from the phone that we called to retrieve the message you missed or opt back in.

div.span: The Hazelwood School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, sex, sexual orientation or disability, in admission or access to, or treatment or employment in its programs and activities. Any person having inquiries concerning Hazelwood's compliance with the regulations implementing Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (Title VI), Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 (Section 504), or Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 (ADA), may contact the Assistant Superintendent for Human Resources.
